languages.text: "Ты видела неизбежность, зрящая Ша'эиль. Тень Пожирателя. Утешай себя тем, что едва ли доживешь до дня, как она тебя настигнет".
"What you saw was inevitability, seer of Sha'eil. The Shadow of the Devourer. Seek solace in the knowledge that you will probably not live to see the day when it reaches you."
languages.original_text: "Ты видела неизбежность, зрящая Ша'эиль. Тень Пожирателя. Утешай себя тем, что едва ли доживешь до дня, как она тебя настигнет".

traits.locale_text: "You saw inevitability, seer of Sha'eil. The Shadow of the Devourer. Seek solace in knowing that you will probably not live to see the day when it reaches you."

languages.text: "Was Ihr gesehen habt, war Unvermeidlichkeit, Sha'eil-Seher. Den Schatten des Verschlingers. Sucht Trost in dem Wissen, dass Ihr den Tag vermutlich nicht mehr erleben werdet, an dem er Euch erreicht."
languages.original_text: "What you saw was inevitability, seer of Sha'eil. The Shadow of the Devourer. Seek solace in the knowledge that you will probably not live to see the day when it reaches you."

traits.locale_text: "Was Ihr gesehen habt, war Unvermeidlichkeit, Sha'eil-Seher. Den Schatten des Verschlingers. Sucht Trost in dem Wissen, dass Ihr den Tag vermutlich nicht mehr erleben werdet, an dem er Euch erreicht."

languages.text: « Ce que vous avez vu n'est autre que la fatalité, divinatrice du Sha'eil. L'ombre du Dévoreur. Consolez-vous en songeant que vous mourrez probablement avant qu'elle ne vous atteigne. »
languages.original_text: "What you saw was inevitability, seer of Sha'eil. The Shadow of the Devourer. Seek solace in the knowledge that you will probably not live to see the day when it reaches you."

traits.locale_text: « Ce que vous avez vu n'est autre que la fatalité, divinatrice du Sha'eil. L'ombre du Dévoreur. Consolez-vous en songeant que vous mourrez probablement avant qu'elle ne vous atteigne. »

languages.text: «Lo que viste es algo inevitable, vidente del Sha'eil. la Sombra del Devorador. Confórtate sabiendo que probablemente no vivas para ver el día en el que llegará aquí».
languages.original_text: "What you saw was inevitability, seer of Sha'eil. The Shadow of the Devourer. Seek solace in the knowledge that you will probably not live to see the day when it reaches you."

traits.locale_text: «Lo que viste es algo inevitable, vidente del Sha'eil. la Sombra del Devorador. Confórtate sabiendo que probablemente no vivas para ver el día en el que llegará aquí».

languages.text: 「あなたが見たものは必然だった、シャーエイルの先見者よ。貪る者の影。それがあなたに到達する日をお前は見ることはないでしょう。だからこそ、慰めを求めるのよ」
languages.original_text: "What you saw was inevitability, seer of Sha'eil. The Shadow of the Devourer. Seek solace in the knowledge that you will probably not live to see the day when it reaches you."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたが見たものは必然だった、シャーエイルの先見者よ。貪る者の影。それがあなたに到達する日をお前は見ることはないでしょう。だからこそ、慰めを求めるのよ」

languages.text: “纱芮尔的先知，你看到的是避无可避的命运，是吞噬者的影子。不过你可以放心，你根本活不到它出现在你面前的那天。”
languages.original_text: "What you saw was inevitability, seer of Sha'eil. The Shadow of the Devourer. Seek solace in the knowledge that you will probably not live to see the day when it reaches you."

traits.locale_text: “纱芮尔的先知，你看到的是避无可避的命运，是吞噬者的影子。不过你可以放心，你根本活不到它出现在你面前的那天。”

languages.original_text: "What you saw was inevitability, seer of Sha'eil. The Shadow of the Devourer. Seek solace in the knowledge that you will probably not live to see the day when it reaches you."

languages.text: "Senin gördüğün kaçınılmaz olandı Sha'eil'in medyumu. Yiyip Yutan'ın Gölgesi'ydi. Sana ulaştığı günü muhtemelen görmeyeceğin hakikatinde teselli bul."
languages.original_text: "What you saw was inevitability, seer of Sha'eil. The Shadow of the Devourer. Seek solace in the knowledge that you will probably not live to see the day when it reaches you."
